description:
A collection of powershell functions for managing HP BIOS, and streamlining the download and organization of Softpaq downloads.


- [NEW] Adds Get-HPWarrantyInfo command.
- [NEW] Adds support for Windows 11 25H2 to SoftPaq Management and SoftPaq Repository commands.
- [NEW] Adds "HP" keyword to command names to reflect a consistent naming standard among all CMSL commands.
- [NEW] Adds optional Password parameter to Get-HPSoftpaq.
- [NEW] Adds optional LatestSupportedOs parameter to Get-HPSoftpaqList.
- [NEW] Allows filtering for specific Driver category values to Category parameter for Get-HPSoftpaqList.
- [NEW] Introduces an online mode to streamline trust chain validation in Security module.
- [UPDATED] Includes all imported and available versions of modules to output of Get-HPCMSLEnvironment.
- [UPDATED] Adds SHA384 hash verification to Get-HPBIOSUpdates.
- [UPDATED] Fortifies online flash authentication for BIOS updates.
